page.title: 06DAINTIFYT FACTORY LIMAVADY 2
page.content: PRODUCTS AND MARKETS The main product is bras and 120,000 are produced each week. Daintifyt supplies one third of all the bras sold by{Marks and Spencer}not only in their stores in Britain but in countries such as{Japan, Hong Kong, {the Bahamas, New Zealand}and{South {Africa. }The remainder of the output (about 10%) is sold to{Dunnes Stores in the Republic of Ireland and to shops in Britain and France. LABOUR The company employs 476 women and 25 men. They come from a radius of 15-20 miles. IMPORTANCE OF THE FACTORY TO LIMAVADY Daintifyt is important to Limavady as it provides jobs in an area of high unemployment and the{Â£2 million earned {by the workers}each year is spent loc- ally and so provides many more jobs.
